This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose,
and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website and use our
widget that combines furniture from local stores (the "Service").

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We may collect personal information from you when you voluntarily provide
it to us through your use of the Service.

collection.sentence:

includes, but is not limited to:

Non-Personal Information:

We may also collect non-personal information about you automatically when you
access and use the Service.

This information may include your IP address,
browser type, operating system, referring URLs, and other technical
information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We may use the information we collect from you for the following purposes:

2.1.

collection.label: OMITTED

We do not
knowingly collect personal information from individuals under 16 years of age.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If we discover that we have collected personal information from a child under
